text: John Stalberg, Jr. is an American movie director and screenwriter. The first movie Stalberg directed was the comedy High School. It premiered at the Sundance Film Festival. It was released theatrically by Anchor Bay Entertainment on June, 1, 2012. He is also developing the project "Spanking Shakespeare", which he is writing and directing. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:American screenwriters Category:1976 births
title: John Stalberg Jr.
